posts.post_content:
I have been doing a little upgrading and have a few duplicate T206s to spare. 

[URL=http://s235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/?action=view&current=fromts.jpg][IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/th_fromts.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL=http://s235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/?action=view&current=back-2.jpg][IMG]http://i235.photobucket.com/albums/ee291/bbcard1/th_back-2.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Actually, a lot of these are perfectly respectable. They are:

Hartsel, Old Mill back SOLD
Egan, decent image, Sovereign back with some pull, about 25% of the back $18
Howell, hands at waist, Piedmont 350-460 backstamp, some mile paper loss on back, a little extra ink from an exuberant stamper $18
Graham ST L A Piedmont 350 back $15
Burke, Indianapolis, a little paper loss on both sides, SC 350 $10
L. Tanehill Piedmont 350 $20
Lake throwing St. L A Piedmont 350 $20
Cy Young Throwing rough condition SC 150 SOLD
Merkle Piedmont 350 Portrait SOLD
Sharpe Newark, funny OC back cut SOLD
F. Jones Portrait, SC 150 $25

Click for larger image. Will consider reasonable offers.
